This used to be the one of the best fastfood outlet in prayagraj. I have been coming here since 2013, and this place and went from 5 star to 1 star.  Cold food, employees are over-worked and short handed, wait time is horrendous even when there are barely few people here. The screen doesn't show prder status anymore, 2nd floor is never open. Above all the place is filthy.  I hope it gets back to its glory days or else maybe today will be my last visit here.

I love to sit near the glass pane and watch the chaos of the city while munching on my chicken. This place is the favourite to me. What's there not to love. Food? Good. Place? Calming.  It's renovated now by the way. Have a look.

I visited here Saturday evening and the place was not very crowded. We ordered Chicken Bucket, Double chicken roll and Chizza. Clearly speaking the Double Chicken Roll is not at all worth it. It was very dry and bland. The fried chicken bucket was as usual tasty but the frying was not proper at all. Lot of oil was left in the chicken ahe I could feel drinking oil. Chizza was good and tasty. Another problem here is the efficiency in management. Traditional ordering counters are not available here. Here they placed 3 self ordering screens. Out of which only one is working and that too is operated by the employee. That means only 1 ordering counter is available in the whole facility and it also defeats the purpose of self ordering. Hope all gets corrected soon.

I am writing to share my disappointment regarding the ongoing poor experience I‚Äôve faced at your KFC Civil Lines, Allahabad outlet. Over the past eight years, I have regularly visited this branch, hoping for improvement ‚Äî unfortunately, there has been no visible change in quality, service, or hospitality.  Here are some specific issues: 1. Poor Quality of Chicken Especially on Wednesdays, the chicken served is often of very low quality ‚Äî it tastes stale, is often poorly cooked, and lacks the standard flavor I‚Äôve experienced in other cities. 2. Inconsistent Taste The taste and freshness of food served here do not match the standards of other KFC outlets in cities like Delhi or Lucknow It feels like a completely different restaurant, not part of the KFC brand. 3. Unprofessional Staff and Service The staff lacks professionalism. Many of them are often seen chatting behind the cash counter, ignoring customer service. Their hospitality and attentiveness are far below expectations. 4. Poor Serving Practices The chicken is often kept for a long time, and when served, it is barely warm and feels microwaved rather than freshly cooked. This greatly affects the overall dining experience.  As a loyal customer and fan of KFC, it‚Äôs extremely disappointing to see this lack of quality and care at one of your outlets. I sincerely urge the management to look into this matter seriously and take corrective steps ‚Äî including staff training, quality control, and ensuring food freshness.  I hope to see real improvement soon.

Food is one thing, but the staff attitude here is the real disappointment. They behave like they're doing you a favor instead of serving customers. If you use a discount, they treat you like a burden, as if the money comes from their pocket. Respect for customers is missing, and that ruins the whole experience

KFC:- Finger-lickin' üíØ I recently had the pleasure of dining at KFC, and it was a truly satisfying experience. The restaurant was clean and inviting, with friendly staff eager to assist. I ordered their classic Original Recipe chicken, and it was every bit as delicious as I remembered. The crispy skin was perfectly seasoned, and the meat was juicy and tender. The mashed potatoes and gravy were the perfect accompaniment, and the biscuits were warm and flaky. The service was prompt and efficient, and the overall atmosphere was enjoyable. Whether you're craving a quick bite or a family meal, KFC is a reliable choice for delicious fried chicken. I highly recommend it!

Last month I went there at 11:30PM due to late Bus and Restaurant had closed as official time 11PM. I knew it'd been late but I requested for food order to  staff who were sweeping floor. They didn't allow me to get order because of late.But suddenly a KFC senior member was going to home and saw me while standing on gate so he asked  " what are you requesting for "... I told my problem. And He let me get order from his reserved order which were supposed to delivery later. I really appreciated him a lot and said thanks to him, because he really helped me.

Came here expecting fried chicken, got served fried ego instead. Staff here act like gods of chicken - if you dare use a discount, they look at you like you're eating from their salary. Newsflash: customers pay you, not the other way around. Food can't cover up arrogance, and this outlet is proof.

I visited KFC today along with my cousin. I was in Prayagraj for few days and had craving for Chicken wings and hence we headed towards KFC. The parking space was ample and the seating capacity of this branch of KFC is quite good. We sat on the ground floor however the first floor seating facility is under construction. We ordered Chicken wings bucket, Veg Burger meal and Non Veg Burger meal. The taste was authentic KFC. Overall we had great time here. Order preparation speed was also super quick.

KFC (Kentucky Fried Chicken) is a globally renowned fast-food chain, famous for its crispy fried chicken and quick service. Here's a detailed review of the place:  Pros:  1. Signature Taste: The "11 herbs and spices" recipe delivers consistently delicious fried chicken with a crispy exterior and juicy interior.  2. Variety: Apart from chicken, KFC offers burgers, wraps, rice bowls, and vegetarian options to cater to diverse preferences.  3. Ambience: Most outlets provide a clean, comfortable, and family-friendly environment.  4. Quick Service: Efficient order processing, especially with online and app-based options.  5. Global Standards: KFC maintains uniform quality and taste across its outlets worldwide.  1. Price: Slightly expensive compared to local fast-food options.  2. Health Concerns: Fried and calorie-rich food may not appeal to health-conscious customers.  3. Limited Customization: Menu customization options are limited.  4. Crowded at Peak Hours: Popular outlets often experience long waiting times during rush hours.  Who Should Visit?  Fast-Food Enthusiasts: People who love fried chicken or American fast food.  Families: A good place for casual dining with kids.  Quick Bites: Ideal for those looking for a fast and filling meal.  Try their iconic Bucket Meal for sharing with friends or family.  Check for ongoing deals or combos for better value.  Explore their dessert options, like the Choco Lava Cake, for a sweet finish.

Ekdam ghatiya maal wested 1800rs don't wrost your money and time  Disappointing Experience at KFC  I recently ordered a meal from KFC for Rs. 1800, and I must say, it was one of the most disappointing dining experiences I've had.  Firstly, the order took an unusually long time to arrive, which was frustrating. When the food finally arrived, it was lukewarm at best. The chicken was dry and lacked the signature flavor that KFC is known for. It felt like it had been sitting out for too long.  Additionally, the sides were underwhelming. The fries were soggy, and the coleslaw was bland and lacked freshness. I was expecting a satisfying meal, but instead, I felt like I had wasted my money.  To make matters worse, the packaging was subpar, with some items spilling out and making a mess. Overall, for Rs. 1800, I expected a much better quality of food and service. I left feeling unsatisfied and unlikely to order from KFC again anytime soon at prayagraj.  I hope this feedback helps improve their service and food quality in the future.

Nice place for non-vegetarians. Staff is good and cooperative. Good for chicken fries ,popcorns, coffee, crunchy chicken wings and pieces are best here. Dont try rolls‚ùå there is just a piece or fried chicken n sauces, no patties. Rest is superb.

After many years I wanted to retry KFC and took a couple of my friends along with. It was their 1st experience at KFC.  My experience are bulleted below. Please note we ordered in person and not via the kiosk:  - Menu experience was atrocious. Very poorly designed and confusing which I think is deliberate at these fast food chains. Difficult to easily get the needed information to make your decisions.  - Initially they forgot our order, and after reminding them again after 15 minutes they started with it. Please note the restaurant was effectively empty. They only had a 1-2 orders in total.  - They got our order wrong. They gave us wrong drinks (twice) and wrong side dish quantity.  - Even though the staff were polite, they were not professional enough. We didn't even get our bill among other things. Lol.  - Burgers were ok, they need to put more sauce/mayo/whatever, as it was just bread and patty effectively. Fries were easily the worse among its competitors (BK, McD, etc.).
The KFC attached to Civil Lines Bus stand. If you are about to take a bus and before that if you need some refreshment snacks then this could be a better option.

And of you are a first timer then its my humble request please don't go here and ruin your magic moment. KFC is a feel of mixed emotions for many people especially that fried chicken experience and these guys are just ruining it deliberately. KFC please do something and close this outlet.
